#labels Featured,Phase-Support
=Controls=

==Version for S60v3 devices==
Keys in emul:
  * 1           - menu
  * `*`         - virtual keys
  * 2,4,5,6,8   - joystick
  * 0           - enter
  * #           - space
  * vol up/down - change volume

For holding key in virtual keyboard, focus it and press '#'.

You need to install [http://code.google.com/p/unrealspeccyp/source/browse/wiki/redist/Symbian/s60v3/pips_s60_1_7_ss.sis Open C++ plugin].

==Version for S60v5, Symbian^^1^, Symbian^^3^ devices==
Version for touch-screen phones requires installation of [http://qt.nokia.com Qt framework].

It consist of 2 installation packages : *qt.sis* and *qtmobility.sis*.

You can find it here:

[http://code.google.com/p/unrealspeccyp/source/browse/wiki/redist/Symbian/QtSymbian%5E1-4.7.3/ for Symbian 9.4 (S60v5) and Symbian^1]

[http://code.google.com/p/unrealspeccyp/source/browse/wiki/redist/Symbian/QtSymbian%5E3-4.7.3/ for Symbian^3]
